argument.name: text
argument.description: The results of the evaluated expression are appended to each line written.

argument.name: pane
argument.description: Optional. Default = "User". The name of the window pane to create.

page.description: Write line to the trace window.
page.discussion: The TRACE.WRITELN() method sends a text string to the current line of the Trace window and then moves the insertion point to the next line in the Trace window.

section.description: Send the words "Hello" and "World" to different lines in the Trace window.
Write a number to the Trace window.
section.example: dim cn as N cn = 12.123 trace.writeln("" + cn)
